name: AHP Twitch Bot
description: A Python program I built to deploy a Twitch Bot where custom commands can easily be designed with JSON. Also designed to interface with my Stream Layout app.

name: AHP Stream Layout
description: A very simple Node app that runs locally and provides a browser source that can be used to easily generate stream layouts styled with CSS. Also has API endpoints that can easily be called by my Twitch Bot to adjust my stream layout on the fly.

name: Smash Remix Bingo
description: Single page app that generates JSON for use with Bingosync to play Smash Remix Bingo

name: Pokemon Battleships
description: An application to connect two users in real time to assist in playing 'Pokemon Battleships' on Twitch!

name: ZSquirrel
description: A 2D game programming library I wrote in Python on top of Pygame. I haven't used it for much and it's not thoroughly documented yet but it was a good experience in working on a project with a larger code-base.

name: AHP MIDI Controller
description: This was a fun experiment to turn any connected USB gamepad device into a MIDI controller. Built on a bundled version of my ZSquirrel library.
